Paragraph: In order to deeply study the variation of the performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO after annealing , the thin - film microstructures and topographies were investigated by X-ray diffraction ( XRD ) and AFM.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to deeply study the variation of the performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO after annealing , the thin - film microstructures and topographies were investigated by X-ray diffraction ( XRD ) and AFM.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO |
| thin-film microstructures |
| topographies |
| X-ray diffraction (XRD) |
| AFM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO |
| thin-film microstructures |
| topographies |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be considered as material properties, as they describe characteristics of the OFETs (Organic Field-Effect Transistors) of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "X-ray diffraction (XRD)" and "AFM," are methods used to investigate the material properties.

Paragraph: In order to deeply study the variation of the performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO after annealing , the thin - film microstructures and topographies were investigated by X-ray diffraction ( XRD ) and AFM.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO |
| thin-film microstructures |
| topographies             |
| investigated by X-ray diffraction (XRD) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| performances of OFETs of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO |

| topographies             |
| investigated by X-ray diffraction (XRD) results |
| investigated AFM data        |

Note: OFETs stands for Organic Field-Effect Transistors. The properties being studied are the performances of these transistors for PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO materials.
